abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Queen of Sheba
            Safe Motherhood Project are to: (a) provide quality maternal
            care to about 30,000 eligible women in targeted districts in
            Sana'a; and (b) design and implement a model of
            maternal care which demonstrates how Yemeni public policy on
            maternal and child care can be effectively integrated with
            private health provision. The changes are: (i) extension of
            the project closing date; (ii) amendment of the revised
            project development objective (PDO); (iii) reallocation of
            grant proceeds; and (iv) cancellation of a portion of the
            unused grant funds.
